Text: Glad to see you back. Hope all is well now. I was getting nervous that I would not be able to watch many Steelers' games this year. Thanks for keeping up the hard work.
Sorry I did not read your comment. I think 2 gigs is a good size if the quality is better. And of course my request as always is the Steelers. Thanks.
thanks and welcome back could you also catch us up on week 2 thanks and great job you are doing
Again, I greatly appreciate the upload.  You wouldn't happen to have the week 2 Jaguars vs Jets game would you?  The only versions I can find are password protected.  Thanks again.
